workflow.name: Process testimonials with GPT-4 & auto-generate social media cards with Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## **Automated AI-Powered Testimonial Processing & Social Media Workflow**
---

### **Overview:**
This comprehensive workflow automates the entire testimonial collection and publishing process, from submission to social media-ready content. It uses AI to enhance testimonials, generates beautiful branded cards, and implements an approval system before posting.

### **Key Features:**
- ‚úÖ **Webhook-based submission** - Accept testimonials via API
- ü§ñ **AI Enhancement** - GPT-4 polishes grammar while maintaining authenticity
- üé® **Automated Design** - Generates professional 800x600px testimonial cards
- ‚òÅÔ∏è **Cloud Storage** - Uploads to Google Drive with organized naming
- üìä **Database Logging** - Tracks all testimonials in Google Sheets
- üîî **Team Notifications** - Slack alerts for new and approved testimonials
- ‚úÖ **Approval Workflow** - Manual review before social media posting
- üîÑ **Scheduled Checker** - Auto-detects approved testimonials every 5 minutes

### **Workflow Steps:**

**Main Flow (Testimonial Processing):**
1. Receives testimonial via webhook (POST request)
2. Validates and cleans data (name, testimonial, photo, email)
3. Enhances testimonial using GPT-4 Turbo
4. Generates HTML template with customer details
5. Converts HTML to PNG image (800x600px)
6. Uploads image to Google Drive
7. Logs all data to Google Sheets with "Pending Approval" status
8. Sends Slack notification to review team

**Approval Flow (Scheduled Check):**
1. Runs every 5 minutes automatically
2. Checks Google Sheets for approved testimonials
3. Filters testimonials not yet posted
4. Sends ready-to-post Slack notification with formatted text
5. Marks testimonial as processed in database

### **Use Cases:**
- SaaS companies collecting customer feedback
- Marketing agencies managing client testimonials
- E-commerce businesses showcasing reviews
- Course creators featuring student success stories
- Any business automating social proof collection

### **What Makes This Workflow Special:**
- **Zero manual design work** - Beautiful cards generated automatically
- **AI-powered quality** - Professional grammar enhancement
- **Audit trail** - Complete tracking in Google Sheets
- **Approval control** - Review before publishing
- **Duplicate prevention** - Smart matching by Drive ID
- **Flexible input** - Accepts multiple field name variations

---

## üîß **Required Integrations:**

1. **OpenAI API** (GPT-4 Turbo) - AI testimonial enhancement
2. **HTML/CSS to Image API** - Screenshot generation
3. **Google Drive OAuth2** - Image storage
4. **Google Sheets OAuth2** - Database management
5. **Slack API** - Team notifications

---

## üìã **Prerequisites:**

- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)
- OpenAI API key (https://platform.openai.com)
- HTML/CSS to Image account (https://htmlcsstoimg.com) - Free tier available
- Google Cloud project with Drive & Sheets API enabled
- Slack workspace with app permissions

---

## üöÄ **Setup Instructions:**

### **1. Import Workflow**
- Download the JSON file
- Import into your n8n instance
- Replace placeholder credentials (see below)

### **2. Configure Credentials**
Add these credentials in n8n:
- **OpenAI API** - Your API key
- **htmlcsstoimgApi** - User ID and API key
- **Google Drive OAuth2** - Configure OAuth app
- **Google Sheets OAuth2** - Same Google Cloud project
- **Slack API** - Create Slack app with `chat:write` scope

### **3. Update Configuration**
Replace in the JSON:
- **Google Drive Folder ID** - Your testimonial storage folder
- **Google Sheets ID** - Your database spreadsheet
- **Slack Channel ID** - Your notification channel

### **4. Test the Workflow**
Send a POST request to your webhook URL:
```json
{
    "name": "Sarah Johnson",
    "designation": "Marketing Director",
    "photo_url": "https://i.pravatar.cc/400?img=5",
    "testimonial_text": "Working with this team was amazing!",
    "email": "sample@gmail.com"
}
```
---

## üìä **Google Sheets Setup:**

Create a Google Sheet with these columns:
- Timestamp
- Name
- Designation
- Original Testimonial
- Testimonial (Enhanced)
- Image Link
- Drive ID
- Status
- Email
- Original Length
- Enhanced
- Source
- Posted to Social
- Posted At

---

## üé® **Customization Options:**

- Modify AI prompt for different enhancement styles
- Change HTML template colors/design
- Add more validation rules
- Integrate with Twitter/LinkedIn APIs for auto-posting
- Add email notifications instead of Slack
- Include rating/score system
- Add custom approval fields

---

## üÜò **Troubleshooting:**

**Webhook not receiving data:**
- Check webhook URL is correct
- Verify HTTP method is POST
- Ensure Content-Type is application/json

**AI enhancement failing:**
- Verify OpenAI API key is valid
- Check API usage limits
- Ensure sufficient credits

**Image not generating:**
- Confirm htmlcsstoimg credentials are correct
- Check HTML template has no errors
- Verify you haven't exceeded free tier limit

**Google Drive upload failing:**
- Re-authenticate OAuth2 connection
- Check folder ID is correct
- Verify folder permissions

---

## üèÜ **Perfect For:**

- Marketing teams
- Customer success teams
- Product managers
- Social media managers
- Growth hackers
- Agency owners

---

## ‚öñÔ∏è **License:**
Free to use and modify for personal and commercial projects.

parameters.content:
## üöÄ WORKFLOW START: TESTIMONIAL COLLECTION

**Purpose:** Entry point for testimonial submissions

**Expected Data:**
- name or Name
- designation/Designation/role
- testimonial_text/testimonial/Testimonial
- photo_url/Photo/photo (optional)
- email/Email (optional)

## ‚úÖ DATA VALIDATION & CLEANING

**What it does:**
- Extracts data from webhook payload
- Validates required fields (name, testimonial)
- Sets default values for missing fields
- Generates fallback avatars using UI Avatars API
- Removes HTML tags and extra spaces
- Prevents XSS attacks

## ü§ñ AI ENHANCEMENT SETUP

**AI Instructions:**
- Fix grammar and spelling
- Keep natural and conversational
- Maintain enthusiasm
- No fake details
- Similar length to original

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=You are a professional editor. Polish the following testimonial to be grammatically perfect while maintaining the original tone, enthusiasm, and authenticity. Keep it natural and conversational. Do not add fake details or change the meaning. Keep the length similar to the original.

Original testimonial:
{{ $json.testimonial }}

Return ONLY the improved testimonial text, nothing else. No quotes, no preamble.

parameters.content:
## üß† OPENAI PROCESSING

**Model:** GPT-4 Turbo Preview

**What happens:**
1. Sends prompt + testimonial to OpenAI
2. AI improves grammar and readability
3. Preserves original meaning and tone
4. Returns polished testimonial

## üì¶ EXTRACT AI RESPONSE

**What it does:**
- Extracts enhanced text from OpenAI response
- Handles multiple response formats
- Merges with original data
- Tracks enhancement metadata

## üé® HTML TEMPLATE GENERATION

**What it does:**
- Creates beautiful testimonial card
- Responsive design with gradient background
- Professional styling with Inter font
- 5-star rating display
- Customer photo with fallback initials
- XSS protection

## üì∏ HTML TO IMAGE CONVERSION

**Service:**(https://htmlcsstoimg.com)

**What it does:**
- Converts HTML template to PNG image
- Renders at 800x600px
- Returns image URL

## ‚¨áÔ∏è DOWNLOAD IMAGE

**What it does:**
- Fetches PNG from URL
- Downloads as binary file
- Prepares for Google Drive upload

**HTTP Request Settings:**
- Method: GET
- URL: From previous node
- Response: Binary file format

## ‚òÅÔ∏è GOOGLE DRIVE UPLOAD

**What it does:**
- Uploads PNG to Google Drive
- Saves to "testimonial data" folder
- Uses dynamic filename from HTML node
- Returns shareable link and Drive ID

**File Name Format:**
CustomerName_Testimonial_Timestamp.png

## üì¢ SLACK NOTIFICATION

**Notification Includes:**
‚úì Customer name, role, email
‚úì Enhanced testimonial
‚úì Original testimonial (comparison)
‚úì Image preview link
‚úì Database status
‚úì Action checklist

parameters.text:
=üéâ *New Testimonial Received!*

*Customer Details:*
- Name: {{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.name }}
- Role: {{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.designation }}
- Email: {{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.email }}

*Testimonial:*
_"{{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.testimonial }}"_

*Original:*
_"{{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.originalTestimonial }}"_

*Image Preview:*
{{ $('Upload to Google Drive').item.json.webViewLink }}

*Database:*
Status: {{ $json.Status }}
Sheet: [View Testimonial Database](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/YOUR_SHEET_ID/edit)

*Actions Required:*
1. Review the testimonial and image
2. Update status in Google Sheet to "Approved" or "Rejected"
3. Approved testimonials will auto-post to social media

---
_Submitted via webhook at {{ $('Generate HTML Template').item.json.timestamp }}_

parameters.content:
## ‚è∞ SCHEDULE TRIGGER - APPROVAL CHECKER

**Purpose:** Automated approval monitoring

**Trigger:** Every 5 minutes

**What it does:**
- Checks Google Sheet for approved testimonials
- Identifies testimonials not yet posted
- Triggers social media posting workflow

## üìñ READ DATABASE

**Data Retrieved:**
- All testimonial records
- Status column (Approved/Pending/Rejected)
- Posted to Social column
- Drive ID for matching

## ‚úîÔ∏è CONDITIONAL FILTER

**What it does:**
- Filters testimonials based on conditions
- Only passes approved testimonials
- Excludes already posted ones

**Logic:**
- TRUE path: Ready to post
- FALSE path: Skip (not approved or already posted)

## üì± SOCIAL MEDIA READY NOTIFICATION

**Notification Contains:**
‚úì Customer details
‚úì Enhanced testimonial
‚úì Original testimonial
‚úì Image preview link
‚úì **Ready-to-post social media text**
‚úì Hashtags included

parameters.text:
=‚úÖ *Testimonial Ready for Social Media!*

*Customer Details:*
- Name: {{ $json.Name }}
- Role: {{ $json.Designation }}
- Email: {{ $json.Email }}

*Testimonial:*
_"{{ $json.Testimonial }}"_

*Original:*
_"{{ $json['Original Testimonial'] }}"_

*View Image:*
{{ $json['Image Link'] }}

---

*üì± Ready-to-Post Social Media Text:*

üåü Hear what our clients say!

"{{ $json.Testimonial }}"

‚Äî {{ $json.Name }}, {{ $json.Designation }}

#ClientSuccess #Testimonial #CustomerReview

---

*Actions Required:*
1. Copy the text above
2. Post to Twitter & LinkedIn manually
3. This testimonial will be marked as processed

_Automated by n8n ‚Ä¢ {{ $now.format('MMM DD, YYYY @ HH:mm') }}_

parameters.content:
## üîÑ MARK AS PROCESSED

**What it does:**
- Updates Google Sheet record
- Marks testimonial as processed
- Adds timestamp

## üìä DATABASE UPDATE

**Data Saved:**
‚úì Timestamp, Name, Designation, Email
‚úì Original + Enhanced testimonial
‚úì Image link (shareable)
‚úì Status: "Pending Approval"
‚úì Enhancement metadata
‚úì Source tracking

## üìã **SETUP CREDENTIALS FIRST**

### **Required API Credentials:**

#### 1. **OpenAI API** ü§ñ
- Sign up at: https://platform.openai.com
- Get API key from dashboard

#### 2. **HTML/CSS to Image API** üì∏
- Sign up at: https://htmlcsstoimg.com

#### 3. **Google Drive OAuth2** ‚òÅÔ∏è
- Enable Google Drive API in Google Cloud Console

#### 4. **Google Sheets OAuth2** üìä
- Use same Google Cloud project

#### 5. **Slack API** üí¨
- Create Slack App at: https://api.slack.com/apps

## üß™ **TEST WORKFLOW**

**Set Headers:**
   - `Content-Type`: `application/json`
**Paste this in Body (raw JSON):**

```json
{
    "name": "Sarah Johnson",
    "designation": "Marketing Director",
    "photo_url": "https://i.pravatar.cc/400?img=5",
    "testimonial_text": "Working with this team was amazing!",
    "email": "sample@gmail.com"
}
```

### **Expected Result:**
‚úÖ Testimonial processed in ~15-30 seconds
‚úÖ Image uploaded to Google Drive
‚úÖ Entry added to Google Sheets
‚úÖ Slack notification sent

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
